title: How to Make Stir Fry with Instant Brown Rice

steps.headline: Cook rice in separate pan according to directions.
Cook Green Giant Immunity Boost Vegetables in microwave according to directions.
steps.description: While they're steaming, cook peas in a separate pan until hot and steaming.

steps.headline: When done, mix all vegetables with rice and cover with a lid (allowing it to steam with the stove either off or on lowest heat).
Scramble both eggs in a separate pan quickly (add a little bit off butter if needed).
steps.description: Chop eggs with a simple spatula into tiny pieces.

steps.headline: Add the eggs to the rice and vegetables and serve hot!

text: Cook rice in separate pan according to directions.  Cook Green Giant Immunity Boost Vegetables in microwave according to directions. While they're steaming, cook peas in a separate pan until hot and steaming. When done, mix all vegetables with rice and cover with a lid (allowing it to steam with the stove either off or on lowest heat).  Scramble both eggs in a separate pan quickly (add a little bit off butter if needed). Chop eggs with a simple spatula into tiny pieces. Add the eggs to the rice and vegetables and serve hot!
